page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We conducted a survey in our school. All the fathers worked and 86% of the mothers worked. 40% of parents worked in Gloucester, 7 miles away, 12% in Cheltenham, and 39% work locally. Of the children who knew where their mothers and fathers worked, we found out that 9 work on farms, 4 are teachers, 25 work in shops or other businesses selling things, 12 are engineers, 4 are builders, 7 are nurses, 7 work in hotels or catering, 5 do domestic work, 2 are professional men (1 doctor). 4 are secretaries. 1 is a supermum!
